Reviews.Title: For the price, it's one of the best
Reviews.Author: rbraz23
Reviews.Content: Pros: Incredibly fast I-7 Processor, High-end Nvidia graphics card for the price range, sleek backlit keyboard, high quality harmon/kodon speakers, nice metallic finishCons: Screen resolution is lacking, ever-so-slight scratching soundI would have given this five stars had it not been for the lackluster screen resolution.  Honestly, everything about this laptop would make you think it's a laptop priced over $1000 (I got it for $750 off Rakuten which used to be buy.com), except for the screen resolution.  My mom also bought a laptop recently from Dell for $350 and it has the exact same screen resolution - now tell me there isn't something wrong with that.  But otherwise, it's a powerful mid-range laptop that will probably last me for a while.

Reviews.Title: "Gaming Specs" Laptop at a Good Price
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I wanted a laptop with "gaming" specs, because they're powerful and can handle most computing tasks and of course gaming if I want.  I am an art student and work with programs like Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.  This laptop is not only beautiful to look at, it's fast and lightweight.  Recommend for those who want a laptop with gaming specs at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Decent overall
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Moore
Reviews.Content: Solid machine, took me a while to get used to the exhaust being on the right hand side. Handles all of the stuff I use it for :- CorelDRAW x6, LoL, WoW, watching movies and basic word processing.

Reviews.Title: RAVIKIRAN VUPPALA
Reviews.Author: RAVI KIRAN VUPPALA
Reviews.Content: Very good product, I like very much, mail is a little long, I waited for a long time, I am satisfied with the overallIs offers you a great deal and great machine! Great hardware and solid manufactureThe only con is windows 8pros:-Screen and resolution-Fan (only gets warm for gaming)-mouse pad very responsive (Left Key Little problem)-Performance fast and as expectedOverall this a fantastic laptop that is worth the price and just what you expect. I will update this as time goes on

Reviews.Title: A good laptop if you can tolerate windows 8
Reviews.Author: Hypnotoad
Reviews.Content: Title says it all.  This laptop is great for the price... IF you can handle Windows 8. Dedicated 2gb gfx card makes gaming nice.  Back lit keyboard is very nice for night/low light use.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for the price
Reviews.Author: BT
Reviews.Content: Very nice laptop for the price.  Fast, capable and fairly light.  As always, touch pads are not so user friendly, but an external wireless mouse more than compensates for this.  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: A great deal!
Reviews.Author: christian
Reviews.Content: Excelent laptop with a really good processing power, which along with a GT740M, makes it perfect for daily use as a multimedia center and gaming. Great quality for a modest price. As for my particular experience, I'm a gamer and love playing on it. Games like Metro 2033, Crysis 2 ME, Battlefield 3 and Dead Space 3 run smoothly at 30 to 40fps on high graphics settings, though you may need to use 720p resolutions. Its PhysX processing ain't good either, so you'll have to disable it to be able to play. Another letdown is its battery life which makes it kind of stuck on a desktop to be plugged in. Games may eat it's power from full to 10% in an hour and a half, two if you are lucky. Its cooling system is excelente making it perfect for long gaming sessions eithout overheating. As for hardware, the keyboard it's good with full numeric keypad and light for latenight use. Powerfull speakers with nice low bass and a pretty average screen. Boot times are really short and with Win 8.1, it doesn't take more than 15 seconds to turn on and be ready to use, even less if it's just sleeping. Overall a great laptop for daily family use and for latenight gamers that don't mind lowering visual quality on their games to have a good experience.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Garet Hofer
Reviews.Content: Honestly at first I wasn't even considering Toshiba. But after looking at this laptop it has the specs i wanted at the price I wanted. So i decided to take the plunge with Beach Camera. I can say i'm glad i did so. The GPU in this laptop makes it nice to play wow at FPS as high as 60-70 in busy cities and a consistent 50+ in raiding environments.If wow isn't your style, I have tested it with multiple different games. In FFXIV, the framerate was absolutely playable. I had no issues with lag what so ever in FFXIV. I had to adjust the graphics settings and put them on normal laptop quality. I've tried this laptop with Day-z Standalone as well. I had some trouble with Day-Z even loading. I would be in the game and it would  often lag out on me. Had to adjust the graphics settings accordingly. Honestly, It is a great buy considering what you get with it. You have to be careful during use though. The laptop will often try and default to the Intel card resulting in poor performance graphic wise. A simple change to default GPU in nvidia settings fixed this.

Reviews.Title: Excellent relation price-value
Reviews.Author: Amilcar Edgardo Aleman Melo "mikeg"
Reviews.Content: Fast Core i7 Procesor, MidRange Nvidia Graphics Card, Big Hard Drive anda good quality brand with no excesive bloatware

Reviews.Title: Awesome but...
Reviews.Author: Jeffalex2
Reviews.Content: This is a very powerful, reliable machine. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is the graphics card. when we got the machine it defaulted to the on board Intel graphics instead of the dedicated GE Force card. Getting it to switch over was harder than it should havebeen and Toshiba CS was no help.

Reviews.Title: Excellent choice
Reviews.Author: Claudio Billig
Reviews.Content: The selected computer fulfills our expectations and the delivery service was perfect according to plan. Very important how you follow customers needs

Reviews.Title: Amazing computer
Reviews.Author: Piero Canales
Reviews.Content: No worries, no complain (until now). The laptop is working/running really good :D great machine. It's comes with the whole accesories, so, I'm able to do everything.

Reviews.Title: Rubbish keyboard
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: Laptop is great, but the keyboard is absolute garbage;You really have to punch out the keys to make them regiser (prime example),Grea for gaming, good performance-wise for the price, but a s*** compuer for typing onrecommend buying a usb keyboard to go with it

Reviews.Title: Second bad experience with Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Rami
Reviews.Content: My first experience with Toshiba was 5 years ago. The motherboard suddenly stopped working a few days after the warranty expired.My second is this laptop which I was hoping to be a better experience. However, the laptop did not start at all the moment I took it out of the box and I believe the issue was motherboard related as well.Toshiba laptops are junk. Avoid the hassle and look for better brands.

Reviews.Title: Good, nice price.
Reviews.Author: Renato
Reviews.Content: The computer is very good. The audio is good. The only problem is that the adapter is very big, although the computer is just 5.3.
